name: Sumo Tomato
body:
##Sumo Tomato

Sumo Tomato is a realtime multiplayer game we built using Node, express, Socketio, and the Phaser Javascript game library. We built this game to experiment with these technologies and craft a fun experience that people could share with their friends.

## What you need

You'll need three things to play Sumo Tomato:

1. A computer (main game screen)

2. A phone

3. Some friends!

To get started, just point the main display to [tinyurl.com/sumotomato](http://tinyurl.com/sumotomato) and then on your phones go to [http://tinyurl.com/sumocontroller](http://tinyurl.com/sumocontroller). 

![](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/OrgulousArtichoke/Greenfield/master/public/client/assets/screenshots/SumoStartScreen.PNG)

Tap the READY button and when everyone is ready to go your phones will automagically transform into Sumo controllers!

![](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/OrgulousArtichoke/Greenfield/master/public/client/assets/screenshots/IMG_0717.PNG)

## How to Play

The premise of Sumo Tomato is decidedly high-concept: you're one of 4 Sumo Wrestlers who have given up the _Dohy≈ç_ and decided to throw tomatoes at each other. Jump, tomato-chuck, and wrestle your way to victory-- the last Sumo standing wins!

![](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/OrgulousArtichoke/Greenfield/master/public/client/assets/screenshots/SumoGameplay.PNG)

Try not to get hit five times, or your controller will tell you:

![](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/OrgulousArtichoke/Greenfield/0d37cf9965c00e9866f4246b8450593d6f643091/public/client/assets/screenshots/IMG_0714.PNG)

We hope you have as much fun playing it as we did building it!
